title: Tadej Pogačar Drops COVID-19 Bombshell On Eve of Tour de France: What It Means for His Yellow Jersey Quest
content:
'There was a bit of a question mark': The opening two stages across the heart of the Apennines will quickly reveal if Pogačar will be paying a price. 

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Drops COVID-19 Bombshell On Eve of Tour de France: What It Means for His Yellow Jersey Quest on Velo.
